naslov: Kuća: Milna, Centar, 324 m2, na parceli 287 m2 (prodaja)
opis: Prodajemo samostojeću kuću na o. Braču u centru mjesta Milna. Kuća je sagrađena na parceli 287 m2, a sastoji se od priz. ( konoba ), visokog priz. ( manji apartman ), 1. kata ( trosoban stan ) i visokog potkrovlja ( roh-bau ) s pogledom na more, ukupne unutarnje površine 243 m2 ( bruto površine 324 m2 ). Preko puta kuće smješten je vrt od 177 m2. Udaljena je 50 m od mora/rive, te kuća ima pristup autom. Građeno po dozvoli iz 1988.g. Potrebno kompletno uređenje. Vlasništvo je uredno. Agencijska provizija 2,5 % ( PDV ne naplačujemo ) We are selling a detached house on the island of Brač, located in the center of Milna. The house is built on a 287 m² plot and consists of a ground floor (wine cellar), a raised ground floor (small apartment), a first floor (three-bedroom apartment), and a high attic (unfinished – shell construction) with a sea view. The total interior area is 243 m² (gross area 324 m²). Directly across from the house is a 177 m² garden. The property is just 50 meters from the sea/promenade and has car access. It was built with a permit issued in 1988. Full renovation is required. Ownership is clear. Agency commission: 2.5% (we don't charge VAT).
